00114 class EGS_BEAM_SOURCE_EXPORT EGS_BeamSource : public EGS_BaseSource {
00115 
00116 public:
00117 
00119     EGS_BeamSource(EGS_Input *, EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00120     ~EGS_BeamSource();
00121 
00122     EGS_I64 getNextParticle(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm,
00123                             int &q, int &latch, EGS_Float &E, EGS_Float &wt,
00124                             EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u);
00125     EGS_Float getEmax() const {
00126         return Emax;
00127     };
00128     EGS_Float getFluence() const {
00129         return count;
00130     };
00131     bool storeState(ostream &data) const {
00132         return egsStoreI64(data,count);
00133     };
00134     bool setState(istream &data) {
00135         return egsGetI64(data,count);
00136     };
00137     bool addState(istream &data) {
00138         EGS_I64 tmp;
00139         bool res = egsGetI64(data,tmp);
00140         count += tmp;
00141         return res;
00142     };
00143     void resetCounter() {
00144         count = 0;
00145     };
00146 
00147     bool isValid() const {
00148         return is_valid;
00149     };
00150 
00151     void setCutout(EGS_Float xmin, EGS_Float xmax, EGS_Float ymin,
00152                    EGS_Float ymax) {
00153         Xmin = xmin;
00154         Xmax = xmax;
00155         Ymin = ymin;
00156         Ymax = ymax;
00157     };
00158 
00159 protected:
00160 
00161     EGS_Library    *lib;    
00162     FinishFunction finish;  
00164     SampleFunction sample;  
00165 
00166     bool        is_valid;
00167     string      the_file_name;
00168     ifstream    the_file;
00169     EGS_Float   Emax;
00170     EGS_I64     count;
00171 
00172     // filters
00173     int         particle_type;
00174     EGS_Float   Xmin, Xmax, Ymin, Ymax;
00175     EGS_Float   wmin, wmax;
00176 
00177     // temporary particle storage
00178     int         q_save, latch_save;
00179     EGS_Float   E_save, wt_save;
00180     EGS_Vector  x_save, u_save;
00181 
00182     // reusing particles
00183     int         n_reuse_photon, n_reuse_electron;
00184     int         i_reuse_photon, i_reuse_electron;
00185 
00186 };
